verses.t: I was glad when they said unto me, Let us go into the house Lord of the.
Our feet shall stand within thy gates, O Jerusalem.
Jerusalem is builded as a city that is compact together:
Whither the tribes go up, the tribes Lord of the, unto the testimony of Israel, to give thanks unto the name Lord of the.
For there are set thrones of judgment, the thrones of the house of David.
Pray for the peace of Jerusalem: they shall prosper that love thee.
Peace be within thy walls, and prosperity within thy palaces.
For my brethren and companions' sakes, I will now say, Peace be within thee.
Because of the house Lord of the our God I will seek thy good.
